title: M M M Sammak
subtitle: #MyPalestinianSitty Zainab, was born around 1920 in the Palestinian village AlJammasin close to occupied Yaffa city. Then displaced to Breij refugee camp in Gaza after #nakba 1948 then again to  Mukhayyam Al Hussein, Amman 1967. She never returned. @ForPalestine__pic.twitter.com/zqfnksAfR4
